# 14.3 Mode
vec1 <- SuicideRate$population
getmode <- function(v)
{
  uniqv <- unique(v)
  uniqv[which.max(tabulate(match(v, uniqv)))]
}
result <- getmode(vec1)
print(result)

range(SuicideRate$population)
